title: _SECTOR_.NEWS
text:
\procedure loadMyWiki() \import [[$:/plugins/sq/ExternalContent/loadWikiActions]] <$transclude $variable="loadWikiActions" wikiURL={{!!wikiURL}} contentFilter={{!!filter}} deserializer="text/html" /> \end
